manticore.presentation.swing.terminal
Class ConsolePrintStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.FilterOutputStream
          java.io.PrintStream
              manticore.presentation.swing.terminal.ConsolePrintStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable
public class ConsolePrintStream
extends java.io.PrintStream

Print stream that can be related to a Swing JTextComponent to be the output of a terminal.

Constructor Detail

ConsolePrintStream

public ConsolePrintStream(javax.swing.text.JTextComponent textComponent,
                          java.awt.Color color)
Creates a new ConsolePrintStream that uses textComponent as output destination with color textColor in append mode.

Parameters:
textComponent - The JTextComponent that is going to show the output
textColor - Color of the output

ConsolePrintStream

public ConsolePrintStream(ConsoleOutputStream consoleOutput)
Creats a ConsolePrintStream that uses the given ConsoleOutputStream as output destination.

Parameters:
consoleOutput - The ConsoleOutputStream that should be used
